<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass hoists instructions to enable speculative execution on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// targets where branches are expensive. This is aimed at GPUs. It</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// currently works on simple if-then and if-then-else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// patterns.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Removing branches is not the only motivation for this</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// pass. E.g. consider this code and assume that there is no</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// addressing mode for multiplying by sizeof(&#42;a):</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     c = a&#91;i + 1&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     e = a&#91;i + 2&#93;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// turns into</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   p = &amp;a&#91;i + 1&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     c = &#42;p;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   q = &amp;a&#91;i + 2&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     e = &#42;q;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// which could later be optimized to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   r = &amp;a&#91;i&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (b &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     c = r&#91;1&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   if (d &gt; 0)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     e = r&#91;2&#93;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Later passes sink back much of the speculated code that did not enable</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// further optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This pass is more aggressive than the function SpeculativeyExecuteBB in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SimplifyCFG. SimplifyCFG will not speculate if no selects are introduced and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it will speculate at most one instruction. It also will not speculate if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there is a value defined in the if-block that is only used in the then-block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These restrictions make sense since the speculation in SimplifyCFG seems</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aimed at introducing cheap selects, while this pass is intended to do more</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// aggressive speculation while counting on later passes to either capitalize on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that or clean it up.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the pass was created by calling</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// createSpeculativeExecutionIfHasBranchDivergencePass or the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -spec-exec-only-if-divergent-target option is present, this pass only has an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// effect on targets where TargetTransformInfo::hasBranchDivergence() is true;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// on other targets, it is a nop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This lets you include this pass unconditionally in the IR pass pipeline, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// only enable it for relevant targets.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="#ad78e062f62e0d6e453941fb4ca843e4d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define DEBUG&#95;TYPE &quot;speculative-execution&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The risk that speculation will not pay off increases with the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// number of instructions speculated, so we put a limit on that.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82" lineLink="#a75912443a19913406c350b2c088579c7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a75912443a19913406c350b2c088579c7">SpecExecMaxSpeculationCost</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;spec-exec-max-speculation-cost&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(7), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/cl/desc">cl::desc</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Speculative execution is not applied to basic blocks where &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;the cost of the instructions to speculatively execute &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;exceeds this limit.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Speculating just a few instructions from a larger block tends not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to be profitable and this limit prevents that. A reason for that is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that small basic blocks are more likely to be candidates for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// further optimization.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92" lineLink="#a24d8b159a8aaa22b155e2c037e25c9a0"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cl/opt">cl::opt&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> <a href="#a24d8b159a8aaa22b155e2c037e25c9a0">SpecExecMaxNotHoisted</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;spec-exec-max-not-hoisted&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#ac12e6a8f3a1b511f0dee2ed6de0ae806">cl::init</a>(5), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a68075925a54790e71ca790e1d4f21a40a263ac008d8d31f13ce460395fc4cf7e6">cl::Hidden</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;exceeds this limit.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not hoist any debug info intrinsics.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if (cond) &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   x = y &#42; z;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   foo();</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// -------- Which then becomes:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// ...</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// if.then:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   %x = mul i32 %y, %z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   call void @llvm.dbg.value(%x, !&quot;x&quot;, !DIExpression())</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   call void foo()</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SpeculativeExecution might decide to hoist the &#39;y &#42; z&#39; calculation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// out of the &#39;if&#39; block, because it is more efficient that way, so the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;%x = mul i32 %y, %z&#39; moves to the block above. But it might also</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// decide to hoist the &#39;llvm.dbg.value&#39; call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is incorrect, because even if we&#39;ve moved the calculation of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;y &#42; z&#39;, we should not see the value of &#39;x&#39; change unless we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// actually go inside the &#39;if&#39; block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SpeculativeExecutionPass::considerHoistingFromTo(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallptrset">SmallPtrSet&lt;const Instruction &#42;, 8&gt;</a> NotHoisted;</Highlight></CodeLine>
